text: Jack Lee Ging (November 30, 1931 â€“ September 9, 2022) was an American actor. He was best known as General Harlan "Bull" Fulbright on the television adventure series The A-Team. He was born in Alva, Oklahoma. His career began in 1958 and he retired in 1994. Ging played college football for the University of Oklahoma. Ging died at his home in La Quinta, California, on September 9, 2022, at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Sportspeople from Oklahoma Category:Actors from Oklahoma
title: Jack Ging
